data.title: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille
data.text:
Perry’s Butcher Shop & Deli was opened by Bob Perry in Houston — a modest meat market that quickly became a staple of the neighborhood.

Perry’s Butcher Shop & Deli was opened by Bob Perry in Houston — a modest meat market that quickly became a staple of the neighborhood.

By 1986, his son, Chris Perry,

had persuaded him to add dining tables,

which proved popular among

loyal customers.

By 1986, his son, Chris Perry, had persuaded him to add dining tables, which proved popular among loyal customers.

After the successful expansion,

Chris Perry was then inspired to open

Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille® combining palate and presentation for a unique

dining experience.

After the successful expansion, Chris Perry was then inspired to open Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille® combining palate and presentation for a unique dining experience.

Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille begins

opening in other Houston communities, starting with The Woodlands.

Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille begins opening in other Houston communities, starting with The Woodlands.

Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille branches outside of the Houston suburban neighborhoods to open its first urban location in Downtown Austin.

Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille branches outside of the Houston suburban neighborhoods to open its first urban location in Downtown Austin.

A big move, Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille opens the first location outside of

The Lone Star State, beginning in

Chicago, IL.

A big move, Perry’s Steakhouse & Grille opens the first location outside of The Lone Star State, beginning in Chicago, IL.

The brand expanded with

CARVE American Grille opening in Southwest Austin, featuring live fire,

eclectic menu, and a butcher room,

paying homage to its butcher shop roots.

The brand expanded with CARVE American Grille opening in Southwest Austin, featuring live fire, eclectic menu, and a butcher room, paying homage to its butcher shop roots.

Perry’s Online Market launches,

offering our famous Pork Chop,

Steak Knives, Butter, and Seasoning shipped to your door nationwide.

Perry’s Online Market launches, offering our famous Pork Chop, Steak Knives, Butter, and Seasoning shipped to your door nationwide.

Perry’s newest restaurant and bar concept, VERDAD True Modern Mexican, opened in Central Austin in December 2023.

Perry’s newest restaurant and bar concept, VERDAD True Modern Mexican, opened in Central Austin in December 2023.

Perry’s operates steakhouse locations across Texas and in 7 other states.

Sister concepts include

Perry & Sons Market & Grille,

CARVE American Grille, and

VERDAD True Modern Mexican.
